entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING, Pickle Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:32 a.m. EDT Saturday 15 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, -4.1Â°C

entry.title: Friday night: Ice pellets mixed with freezing rain. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: A few rain showers or ice pellets changing to ice pellets or freezing rain this evening. Risk of a thunderstorm early this evening. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light overnight. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 4:58 PM EDT Friday 14 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries and risk of freezing drizzle. Wind up to 15 km/h. High zero. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:58 PM EDT Friday 14 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow mixed with ice pellets. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Snow mixed with ice pellets. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 6 in the evening and minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 4:58 PM EDT Friday 14 April 2023
